subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Billie Jean King, who withdrew from the opening ceremony because of her mother’s failing health, will help represent the United States when the Sochi Games close on Feb. 23.
snippet: Billie Jean King, who withdrew from the opening ceremony because of her mother’s failing health, will help represent the United States when the Sochi Games close on Feb. 23.
